CreateBindInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateBindInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ResourceId": "hsihi12923-ioio",
    "AppPkgName": "com.tencent.mm",
    "AppIconUrl": "http://q.com/1.png",
    "AppName": "微信"
}
CreateBindInstance.title: 将应用绑定到资源

CreateCosSecKeyInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateCosSecKeyInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "CosRegion": "ap-guangzhou"
}
CreateCosSecKeyInstance.title: 获取COS临时密钥

CreateResourceInstances.document: 白名单用户通过创建加固资源自己加固。
CreateResourceInstances.title: 创建加固资源

CreateShieldInstance.document: 通过该接口提交要加固的app信息（示例中的AppUrl和CallbackUrl仅示例，实际无法使用，请用实际可用的url进行替换）
CreateShieldInstance.title: 提交一个app进行加固

CreateShieldPlanInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateShieldPlanInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "PlanName": "xx",
    "ResourceId": "xx",
    "PlanInfo": {
        "Dex": "1",
        "SoType": [
            "xx"
        ],
        "AntiLogLeak": "0",
        "ApkSizeOpt": "1",
        "SoInfo": {
            "SoFileNames": [
                "xx"
            ]
        },
        "AntiQemuRoot": "0",
        "AntiVMP": "0",
        "Db": "0",
        "SeperateDex": "0",
        "AntiScreenshot": "0",
        "So": "1",
        "AntiRepack": "1",
        "AntiAssets": "0",
        "DexSig": "1",
        "Bugly": "0",
        "AntiSSL": "0"
    }
}
CreateShieldPlanInstance.title: 新增加固策略

DeleteShieldInstances.document: 通过传入ItemId集合删除1个或者多个加固实例
DeleteShieldInstances.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DeleteShieldInstances
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ItemIds": [
        "xyuu-csu-ee78236l",
        "hhussxu-hui2677-kk"
    ]
}
DeleteShieldInstances.title: 根据ItemId对加固实例进行删除

DescribeApkDetectionResult.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeApkDetectionResult
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ApkUrl": "http://xxx.xxx",
    "ApkMd5": "2751xxxxxd1d203d6621ea28a0axxxxx"
}
DescribeApkDetectionResult.title: 环境安全检测-apk检测

DescribeResourceInstances.document: 获取某个用户的加固资源信息
DescribeResourceInstances.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeResourceInstances
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Pids": [
        "12750"
    ],
    "Limit": "20",
    "Offset": "0"
}
DescribeResourceInstances.title: 获取某个用户的加固资源信息

DescribeShieldInstances.document: 根据加固实例的包名和名称进行筛选，并返回最新的20条记录
DescribeShieldInstances.title: 查询加固实例列表

DescribeShieldPlanInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ms.tencentcloudapi.com

X-TC-Action: DescribeShieldPlanInstance

{
    "ResourceId": "xxx",
    "Pid": "1"
}
DescribeShieldPlanInstance.title: 查询加固策略信息
